Diamond::

She followed him. "If the chip is a mind controlling chip, then what 
about the rest of the necklace? And could there be other chips in the 
necklace?" She looked at Devilduer,"Also, who was the one who 
controlled the mind controlling chip in the first place? won't that 
bot know that the connection had been broken?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::DevilDuer::
> 
> DevilDuer nods, picking up Vamprah and dumping her into a CR 
chamber. 
> He looks bac at Diamond as the CR door closes, the CR chamber 
> beginning repair procedure.
> 
> "Hmm.. Maybe," he says, looking at the chip, "It could be a mind 
> controll chip or something. Let's check it out."
> 
> He walks into the next room of the lab, making his way to a nearby 
> machine.
